docs.title: Intro

docs.text: FIWARE Catalogue Standardized FIWARE badges should be used to represent the various sub-chapters found within the FIWARE Catalogue. The larger, fully styled badge with the FIWARE logo in the correct font should be used whenever possible, but a simplified alternative is also available to match the smaller badge styling found on GitHub. To download a badge select the preferred image format and click on the download button. Alternatively, you can also click on the copy icon to obtain the URL for the badge image hosted on our CDN server and use them within an tag. To obtain the URL for the simplified GitHub badges, click on the GitHub icons. open_in_new Visit the website Core Context Management content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS Interface with IoT, Robots and Third-Party Systems content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS Context Processing, Analysis and Visualisation content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS Context Data/API Management, Publication and Monetization content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS Deployment Tools content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS External Third-party Components content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS Generic Enablers Status content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS Maintenance content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS Stack Overflow content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS

The larger, fully styled badge with the FIWARE logo in the correct font should be used whenever possible, but a simplified alternative is also available to match the smaller badge styling found on GitHub. The exclusion zone is equal to the height of letter I. Minimum Sizes Digital 75px Print 20mm Dont’s 01 Don’t recolour the logo in any way, unless the primary colour. 02 Don’t add effects, tilt or angle the logo in any way. 03 Don’t stack the logo, or reconfigure it in any way.
docs.title: FIWARE Evangelists

docs.text: FIWARE iHubs The iHub Badge is a symbol of highest quality and optimum performance. The FIWARE iHubs Program is a trend-setter. All FIWARE iHubs with whom we work in our local and global competence network are certified, systematically trained, and supported with diverse services. To download a badge select the preferred image format and click on the download button. Alternatively, you can also click on the copy icon to obtain the URL for the badge image hosted on our CDN server and use them within an tag. open_in_new Visit the website download Download PDF Color content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS Monochrome content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS Black content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS White content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS content_copy JPG PNG SVG EPS Logo Usage Clear Space All versions of our logo have exclusion zones around them to help them stand out. The exclusion zone is equal to 0.5x for the x hight. Minimum Sizes Digital 45px Print 12mm Dont’s 01 Don’t recolour the logo in any way, unless the primary colour. 02 Don’t add effects, tilt or angle the logo in any way. 03 Don’t stack the logo, or reconfigure it in any way.
docs.title: FIWARE iHubs

docs.text: FIWARE Global Summit Poppins open_in_new Get font About Poppins is a sans-serif typeface, consisting of 9 styles, ranging from Thin to Black. Each letterform is nearly monolinear, with optical corrections applied to stroke joints where necessary to maintain an even typographic color. This font family is licensed under the Open Font License. It is allowed to use freely in products & projects - print or digital, commercial or otherwise. docs.text: Primary Montserrat open_in_new Get font About Montserrat is a sans-serif typeface, consisting of 9 styles, ranging from Thin to Black. Originally designed in 2017 by Julieta Ulanovsky, and since then continuously developed, the low stroke contrast, closed apertures and several angular details define its distinctive characteristics. This font family is licensed under the Open Font License. It is allowed to use freely in products & projects - print or digital, commercial or otherwise. Variants in use 7 weights are available to use. docs.title: Primary

docs.text: Montserrat is a sans-serif typeface, consisting of 9 styles, ranging from Thin to Black. Originally designed in 2017 by Julieta Ulanovsky, and since then continuously developed, the low stroke contrast, closed apertures and several angular details define its distinctive characteristics. This font family is licensed under the Open Font License. It is allowed to use freely in products & projects - print or digital, commercial or otherwise.
docs.title: About

docs.text: 7 weights are available to use. Light 300 Light 300 Italic Regular 400 Regular 400 Italic Medium 500 Medium 500 Italic SemiBold 600 SemiBold 600 Italic Bold 700 Bold 700 Italic ExtraBold 800 ExtraBold 800 Italic Black 900 Black 900 Italic
docs.title: Variants in use

docs.text: Secondary Merriweather open_in_new Get font About Merriweather is a serif typeface, consisting of 4 styles, ranging from Light to Black. It was designed to be a text face that is pleasant to read on screens. It features a very large x height, slightly condensed letterforms, a mild diagonal stress, sturdy serifs and open forms. This font family is licensed under the Open Font License. It is allowed to use freely in products & projects - print or digital, commercial or otherwise. Variants in use All weights are available to use. docs.text: Merriweather open_in_new Get font
docs.title: Secondary

docs.text: Merriweather is a serif typeface, consisting of 4 styles, ranging from Light to Black. It was designed to be a text face that is pleasant to read on screens. It features a very large x height, slightly condensed letterforms, a mild diagonal stress, sturdy serifs and open forms. This font family is licensed under the Open Font License. It is allowed to use freely in products & projects - print or digital, commercial or otherwise.
docs.title: About

docs.text: All weights are available to use. Light 300 Light 300 Italic Regular 400 Regular 400 Italic Bold 700 Bold 700 Italic Black 900 Black 900 Italic
docs.title: Variants in use

docs.text: System Arial About Arial is a sans-serif typeface, consisting of 2 styles, Regular and Bold. The overall treatment of curves is softer and fuller than in most industrial style sans serif faces. Terminal strokes are cut on the diagonal which helps to give the face a less mechanical appearance. This font family is licensed under the Open Font License. It is allowed to use freely in products & projects - print or digital, commercial or otherwise. Variants in use All weights are available to use. docs.title: System Font

docs.text: Arial
docs.title: System

docs.text: Arial is a sans-serif typeface, consisting of 2 styles, Regular and Bold. The overall treatment of curves is softer and fuller than in most industrial style sans serif faces. Terminal strokes are cut on the diagonal which helps to give the face a less mechanical appearance. This font family is licensed under the Open Font License. It is allowed to use freely in products & projects - print or digital, commercial or otherwise.
docs.title: About

docs.text: All weights are available to use. Regular 400 Regular 400 Italic Bold 700 Bold 700 Italic
